name: Faction Reticent
description:
~Before the events~

Quord, a scholar with unknown origins, has been getting strange dreams lately, and has put up an investigation request regarding it. Inubaka, being the starving investigator with little-to-none rating, had no other choice but to accept it. The two departs into another region to investigate, thus starting the events that will follow.

~With insane mobility, comes with insane difficulty~

A game that is designed for veterans, this game imposes challenges through pattern recognition, audio and visual cue recognition and thinking throughout; a game that demands alot from the player.
Play the standard difficulty, for veteran players.
or
Casual difficulty for regular players, to ease up the stuff for them.

~Featuring~

- An explorable map
- Fluid controls
- Playable characters with diversified playstyle
- Engaging upgrade system, each character having an independent set
- Challenging enemies and bosses

Are you up to the challenge?

~Also...~

This game is in an early state. Things are still subject to change, mostly visuals.
